local_llm_description: The image presents a circuit board with two components connected by wires, one of which is a small device labeled "DAC7776" and the other being a larger component. The smaller device has a green light on its top right corner, while the larger component features a pink light on its left side.

external_llm_result.title: Feather to DAC7578 Basic I2C Wiring
external_llm_result.summary: A Fritzing-style wiring diagram connecting an Adafruit Feather board to the DAC7578 breakout. Two additional wires leave the DAC board to a 'DAC Signal Output' node.
